display_long_description:
**Press Start**: "One of the coolest-feeling, most entrancing and memorable VR experiences I've had in some time" 

 **Digital Trends**: "Thrasher quickly cemented itself as one of the best VR games I've ever played" 


From the artist & composer behind the cult hit THUMPER comes THRASHER, a mind-melting arcade odyssey and audiovisual experience. With the wave of your hand (or controller), guide a magnificent space eel through mesmerizing alien worlds.  Swoop, dash and thrash to defeat wild bosses in the ultimate race for survival.  

[media]

# TRANSCEND SPACETIME
Immerse yourself in a dazzling odyssey where music, visuals, and gameplay mesh into one transcendent experience.  Journey from the depths of primordial gloom to the heights of celestial bliss, culminating in a heart pounding reckoning with a cosmic baby god. 

[media]

# YOU VERSUS THE UNIVERSE
Swoop, dash and thrash at breakneck speed, busting through obstacles and stacking up combos, leading to nine jaw dropping encounters with mysterious leviathans that will challenge your skills, and your sanity.

[media]

# POWER UP
Deploy power-ups to supercharge your space eel and max out your combos.  Create a destructive rainbow spray of bullets, bulldoze everything in a blaze of color and light, slow things down to create a perfect path through the chaos, and more.

[media]

# CHILL OR CHALLENGE
Vibe out and enjoy the wild journey, or push yourself to the limit by chaining together massive combos to worm your way up the rankings.


[media]
